parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>Command</title><part><name>Comments</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> arma3 </value></part><part><name>Game name</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>0.74</value></part><part><name>Game version</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> GUI Control - Tree View </value></part><part><name>GROUP1</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Adds an item with given text to Tree View control. The position on Tree View where to add the item and the actual path to this item once added are different. If item is added to existing item, then parent item path is used. If no parent exists, empty array [] is used. See [[Tree View Path]] for more information. </value></part><part><name>DESCRIPTION</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> [[tvAdd]] [idc, pathParent, text] </value></part><part><name>SYNTAX</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> idc: [[Number]] </value></part><part><name>PARAMETER1</name>=<value> 

</value></part><part><name>p2</name>=<value> pathParent: [[Array]] - [[Tree View Path]] of parent item or [] if no parent exists</value></part><part><name>PARAMETER2</name>=<value> 

</value></part><part><name>p3</name>=<value> text: [[String]] </value></part><part><name>PARAMETER3</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Number]] - Index of the added item relative to the branch it was added to </value></part><part><name>RETURNVALUE</name>=<value> 
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name>s2</name>=<value> control [[tvAdd]] [pathParent, text] </value></part><part><name>SYNTAX2</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>p21</name>=<value> control: [[Control]] </value></part><part><name>PARAMETER21</name>=<value> 

</value></part><part><name>p22</name>=<value> pathParent: [[Array]] - [[Tree View Path]] of parent item or [] if no parent exists </value></part><part><name>PARAMETER22</name>=<value> 

</value></part><part><name>p23</name>=<value> text: [[String]] </value></part><part><name>PARAMETER23</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>r2</name>=<value> [[Number]] - Index of the added item relative to the branch it was added to </value></part><part><name>RETURNVALUE2</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>_index = _ctrl [[tvAdd]] [<ext><name>nowiki</name><attr/></ext>[], "Parent Item"];</code> </value></part><part><name>EXAMPLE1</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>x2</name>=<value> <code>_index = [[tvAdd]] [101, [0], "First item"];</code> </value></part><part><name>EXAMPLE2</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="6"/><value> [[tvClear]], [[tvCollapse]], [[tvCount]], [[tvCurSel]], [[tvData]], [[tvDelete]], [[tvExpand]], [[tvPicture]], [[tvSetCurSel]], [[tvSetData]], [[tvSetValue]], [[tvSort]], [[tvSortByValue]], [[tvValue]], [[tvText]], [[tvSetText]], [[tvSetPicture]], [[tvSetPictureColor]], [[tvSetPictureRight]], [[tvSetPictureRightColor]] </value></part><part><name>SEEALSO</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name index="7"/><value>  </value></part><part><name>MPBEHAVIOUR</name>=<value> 
____________________________________________________________________________________________
</value></part></template></root>
